title: Trump’s Attack on Ontario’s Reagan Ad Helped Amplify Its Reach
description: In the global portfolio of political ads that changed history, a handful stand out.

title: ‘This Is Not My First Bubble’: Nvidia’s Bear Stands His Ground
description: Many on Wall Street like to style themselves as contrarians, but few are swimming against the current as hard as Jay Goldberg, the lone bear on high-flying Nvidia Corp.

title: Amazon’s AWS Shows Signs of Weakness as Competitors Charge Ahead
description: The company that invented the cloud business is widely perceived as trailing its rivals in artificial intelligence.
